channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #194, including every tabletop rpg project started between 03/13 and 03/29
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #194, including every tabletop rpg project started between 03/13 and 03/29. Note: It cover the projects started between March 13 to 29. Because I am late to spread it. You’ll find a ton of interesting games, books and other material all about ttrpg. If you miss a project that’s been started within the timeframe and is still live, just contact me. item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #194, including every tabletop rpg project started between 03/13 and 03/29
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #194, including every tabletop rpg project started between 03/13 and 03/29.

Note: It cover the projects started between March 13 to 29. Because I am late to spread it.

You’ll find a ton of interesting games, books and other material all about ttrpg. If you miss a project that’s been started within the timeframe and is still live, just contact me.

English Crowdfundings

3 Roleplaying Games
5 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Urban Drama Roleplaying Games
4 Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Superhero Roleplaying Games
3 XY-Punk Roleplaying Games
1 Hybrid Roleplaying Game
4 Settings
4 Sourcebooks
6 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
2 D&D 5E Bestiary Sourcebooks
5 Adventures
4 D&D 5E Adventures
3 Mörk Borg Adventures
6 Dice Projects
4 Accessoires
4 Plushy Dice Accessoires
3 Deck of Cards
2 Map Projects
1 Enamel Pin
3 Apps
1 Soundscape
5 Various RPG Projects

French Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game
1 Adventure

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/03/29/crowdfunding-kurzubersicht-194-2/
